metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39176 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
BlueZ before 5.59 allows physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation because profiles/audio/avrcp.c does not validate params_len.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-39176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bluetooth - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
bluez - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-cups - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-hcidump - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-obexd - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-tests - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
libbluetooth3 - 5.53-0ubuntu3.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bluez package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.53-0ubuntu3.6').
